sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>(Action) Once per encounter, when riding a beast, the character may perform a Soothing Tone action, attempting an Average (2 difficulty dice) Xenology check. If successful, the beast the character is riding recovers strain equal to net successes on the check (or heals that number of wounds if it does not have a strain threshold).</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Soothing Tone</name> <number>TAL0001294</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>ben.fisher</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-06-25 19:54:57</sys_created_on> <sys_id>6c17b1dc2f09b810e0f497eef699b64b</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>ben.fisher</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-06-25 19:54:57</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
